text: Hiep Thi Le (; November 30, 1971 â€“ December 19, 2017) was a Vietnamese- American actress. She was known for her role in Heaven & Earth (1993). She appeared in Bugis Street (1995, released in the United States in 1997) and co- starred in the little-scene Dead Man Can't Dance (1997). On February 23, 2014, Le appeared on the Food Network game show Chopped, appearing and competing in the eighteenth-season episode "Beer Here!". Le died on December 19, 2017 in Los Angeles, California from stomach cancer at the age of 46.Hiep Thi Le Dies: Star Of Oliver Stone's 'Heaven And Earth' Was 46, deadline.com; accessed December 20, 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Vietnamese actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Da Nang
title: Hiep Thi Le
